statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_ad_metrics WHERE ad_id = 1;
SELECT ad_name, impressions, cost FROM social_media_ad_metrics WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT ad_name, conversions FROM social_media_ad_metrics WHERE impressions BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT ad_id, clicks, cost FROM social_media_ad_metrics WHERE cost < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM social_media_ad_metrics ORDER BY conversions DESC, impressions ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_ad_metrics WHERE ad_id = 1;
SELECT ad_name, clicks FROM social_media_ad_metrics WHERE impressions > 1000 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, impressions, clicks FROM social_media_ad_metrics WHERE cost < 50.00;
SELECT ad_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM social_media_ad_metrics WHERE impressions > 500 ORDER BY conversions DESC, clicks ASC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, impressions, cost FROM social_media_ad_metrics WHERE clicks >= 100 AND conversions > 10 ORDER BY cost ASC, impressions DESC;
SELECT * FROM Social_Media_Ad_Performance;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, impressions FROM Social_Media_Ad_Performance WHERE impressions > 1000;
SELECT ad_name, impressions, clicks FROM Social_Media_Ad_Performance WHERE ad_type = 'Display';
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, conversions FROM Social_Media_Ad_Performance ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT optimization_date, optimization_details FROM Ad_Optimization_Logs WHERE ad_id = 3;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM Social_Media_Ad_Performance WHERE ad_id = 1;
SELECT ad_name, impressions, clicks FROM Social_Media_Ad_Performance WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT ad_name, impressions, conversions FROM Social_Media_Ad_Performance WHERE clicks > 100 AND ad_type = 'Video' ORDER BY conversions DESC, ad_name ASC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, optimization_date, optimization_details FROM Social_Media_Ad_Performance JOIN Ad_Optimization_Logs ON Social_Media_Ad_Performance.ad_id = Ad_Optimization_Logs.ad_id;
SELECT ad_type, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM Social_Media_Ad_Performance GROUP BY ad_type HAVING total_impressions > 5000;
SELECT * FROM social_media_ad_performance_metrics;
SELECT ad_id, platform, clicks FROM social_media_ad_performance_metrics WHERE impressions > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, clicks FROM social_media_ad_performance_metrics ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT ad_id, campaign_name FROM social_media_ad_performance_metrics WHERE clicks > 50 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT engagement_id, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM ad_engagement WHERE interaction_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_ad_performance_metrics ORDER BY impressions DESC, clicks ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT campaign_name, platform, impressions FROM social_media_ad_performance_metrics WHERE platform IN ('Facebook', 'Instagram') AND impressions > 500
SELECT SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, AVG(impressions) AS avg_impressions FROM social_media_ad_performance_metrics
SELECT ad_id, platform, campaign_name, impressions, clicks FROM social_media_ad_performance_metrics WHERE clicks >= 100 ORDER BY platform
SELECT ad_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE status = 'Active' AND start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM ads_performance_metrics;
SELECT ad_name, impressions, clicks FROM ads_performance_metrics WHERE conversions > 0;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT account_name, industry FROM ad_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Premium';
SELECT ad_id, date, impressions, clicks FROM ad_performance_history WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM ads_performance_metrics WHERE impressions > 100 ORDER BY clicks DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ad_name, impressions, conversions FROM ads_performance_metrics JOIN ad_campaigns ON ads_performance_metrics.campaign_id = ad_campaigns.campaign_id WHERE ad_campaigns.status = 'active';

SELECT ad_name, impressions, clicks, conversions, account_name FROM ads_performance_metrics JOIN ad_accounts ON ads_performance_metrics.campaign_id = ad_accounts.account_id ORDER BY conversions DESC, clicks ASC;
SELECT ad_name, impressions, clicks FROM ads_performance_metrics WHERE impressions >= 500 AND clicks < 100 ORDER BY ad_name ASC;

SELECT account_name, industry, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM ads_performance_metrics JOIN ad_accounts ON ads_performance_metrics.campaign_id = ad_accounts.account_id GROUP BY account_name, industry ORDER BY total_conversions DESC, total_impressions DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_accounts;
SELECT account_name, platform FROM ad_accounts ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE account_id = 1;
SELECT SUM(impressions), SUM(clicks), SUM(conversions) FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT region_name, age_range, interests FROM ad_regions JOIN ad_targeting ON ad_regions.region_id = ad_targeting.region_id;
SELECT * FROM ad_accounts ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT account_name, platform FROM ad_accounts WHERE account_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE clicks > 100 AND conversions > 10 ORDER BY spend DESC;

SELECT ad_regions.region_name, ad_targeting.age_range, ad_performance_metrics.impressions FROM ad_regions INNER JOIN ad_targeting ON ad_regions.region_id = ad_targeting.region_id INNER JOIN ad_performance_metrics ON ad_targeting.metric_id = ad_performance_metrics.metric_id;
